title: Erich von Daeniken, Swiss author who popularised ancient‐alien theories, dies at 90
description: ZURICH: Best-selling Swiss author Erich von Daeniken, who built a lucrative career on his argument, rubbished by scientists and archaeologists, that humanity owes much of its development to the intervention of extraterrestrials, has died aged 90."Chariots of the Gods?", published in 1968,

title: Erich von Dadniken, author who popularised ancient‐alien theories, dies at 90
description: ZURICH - Best-selling Swiss author ‍Erich von Daeniken, ‍who built a lucrative career on his argument, rubbished by scientists and archaeologists, that humanity owes much of its development to the intervention of extraterrestrials, has died aged 90.

title: Erich von Daniken, author who popularised ancient‐alien theories, dies at 90
description: ZURICH - Best-selling Swiss author ‍Erich von Daniken, ‍who built a lucrative career on his argument, rubbished by scientists and archaeologists, that humanity owes much of its development to the intervention of extraterrestrials, has died aged 90.

title: FAITH: An Ancient Blessing for the New Year
description: The blessing of homes and household at Epiphany has long been a tradition in the Catholic faith, and this year St. Paul Catholic Church priest Father Rusty Vincent encouraged parishioners to observe the custom.

title: Erich von Daeniken, Swiss author who popularised ancient‐alien theories, dies at 90
description: His book Chariots of the Gods?, which theorised that advanced aliens had repeatedly visited Earth, sold millions of copies.
